settings.title: Built From Experience
settings.text:
At Flexfilm, we know what it takes to run a successful window tinting
business. Because of this, we can anticipate the needs of our customers like no one else. We are dedicated to supporting and working with our customers to ensure their success.

Built From Experience

At Flexfilm, we know what it takes to run a successful window tinting business. Because of this, we can anticipate the needs of our customers like no one else. We are dedicated to supporting and working with our customers to ensure their success.

settings.textarea: In 2011, Flexfilm was founded with a simple mission: build the film you would install every day if you were the window tinter.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: Our goal as a company is two-fold: to offer our installers the highest quality products at the best price while offering customer care that goes above and beyond and to provide the end customer with high performance products full of solar benefits that provides comfort and protection.

settings.title: Our History
settings.text: Flexfilm started humbly in a driveway in 1987 when Ralph Van Pelt tinted his Nissan Pulsar. Soon after, Window Tinting by Ralph Van Pelt was born in that same driveway where he honed his skills and learned the trade.

During the 1990s, Ralph partnered with local stereo shops, working with them to create and manage their window tinting service. In 1996, Ralph found success in his first shop, Special FX. Using all his wisdom and experience, Ralph ventured into the manufacturing and distribution of window film, opening Flexfilm's doors in 2011, and Flexfilm has been dedicated to offering the best quality products ever since.

settings.title: Expert Customer Care
settings.text: All of our customer care reps are empowered to make executive decisions so you never get stuck in a fruitless customer support loop.

settings.title: No Restrictions
settings.text: We don't hold quotas over your head or require expensive buy-ins to start working together.

settings.title: Built From Experience
settings.text: Flexfilm is a family-owned company built on decades of knowledge and experience in the industry.

settings.title: We Know Nano
settings.text: We pioneered the first nano window tint and continue to innovate by providing high quality, high performance window tint today.

settings.title: Designed To Sell
settings.text: Our products are easy to up sell and will take your business to new heights.

settings.title: Lifetime Warranty
settings.text: We back our products with a national limited lifetime warranty.

settings.title: Get Rewarded
settings.text: Earn points for every dollar spent and perks for every VIP tier reached when you shop online.

settings.title: Same Day Shipping
settings.text: Same day shipping on orders placed before 12:30PM CST.*

settings.title: Buy Now, Pay Over Time
settings.text: Pick the payment option that works for you and your budget. Just select Shop Pay at checkout.

settings.title: We Know Nano Films
settings.text: We pioneered the first nano films and continue to innovate by providing high quality, high performance window films.

settings.title: Family-Owned
settings.text: Flexfilm is a family-owned company built on the foundation of decades of knowledge and experience in the window tinting industry.

settings.title: No Restrictions

settings.title: Shipping Perks
settings.text: Same day shipping on orders placed before 12:30PM CST and free shipping on orders over $750.*

settings.title: Exclusive Products
settings.text: Get exclusive products that can be found nowhere else in the industry, such as our carbon HP and carbon dual reflective products.
